name: the-witcher-3-the-wild-hunt-color-theme
displayName: The Witcher 3 The Wild Hunt Color Theme
description: Immerse yourself in the dark, mystical world of The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt with this VS Code theme. Inspired by the game’s atmospheric tones, it brings a blend of moody, deep shades and sharp contrasts, reflecting the essence of Geralt’s adventures. Perfect for those who want a touch of fantasy and mystery in their coding environment.
